docs.text: Ariel Sánchez Profile Overview Ariel is a Technical Writer with a background in Literature and Biological Sciences. He has worked producing and reviewing different types of texts for most of his career. At Wizeline, Ariel has experience writing API documentation, user guides, and content for developer portals. Before joining Wizeline, Ariel worked for three and a half years as a proofreader for an American translation agency.
docs.title: Home
